☞ PACKAGE CONTAINS:3Pcs – 1/4″ drive adapter, 3/8″ drive adapter, and 1/2″ drive adapter and each with a 1/4 inch hex shank driver socket wrench adapter set .1/4″ 3/8″ 1/2″ Turns any power drill into a power nut driver Sturdy spring-loaded ball bearing holds sockets securely in place Sockets Snap-On Tightly and Won’t Slip Off.
☞USES: Attach these Versatile Extender Bars to any Powered/Cordless Drill Chuck or Impact Driver to turn it into a High-Speed Nut Driver – Useful for Automotive Mechanic Vehicle Repairs, Technicians, Handyman & Hobbyist Developments to use with sockets on Hardware/Tire Nuts, Lag Bolts, Hex Head Cap Screws at Home, Workshop Factory or Construction Site.
☞Multifunction: used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion.Provides versatility and convenience no matter which tool you chose to use. Great for the DIY, household maintenance, and most general repairs, not for industrial work. A great tool addition to any tool box set.
☞Durability: Quality is a guarantee with this 3 piece sturdy and durable solid steel set designed to withstand torque compression under most standard use situations. The exterior anti-weathering coating provides extra protection from damage against elements and substances such as oil and fluids that may come in contact with the extension bars during use with repairs such as in the automotive field.
☞Warranty: We believe in our products there for we offer a 30 day money back guarantee along with a 12 month replacement warranty for this high quality product.(3 socket adapter impact hex shank bit drill bits driver 1/4″ 3/8″ 1/2″ bar set new grade adapter/extension turns power into high speed nut driver. 1/4″, 3/8″, and drive. piece he x set.hex new. extension 3pc for automotive,dyi home repair tool kits hand tools sockets sets, square wrench)

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99 - $22.29
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:40 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since its inception in 2013, SHOWPIN has been synonymous with quality, innovation, efficiency and value.

As a manufacturer of professional repair tools, we integrate R&D, manufacturing and sales, are committed to designing and manufacturing product that meet our customers’ needs and provide them with reliable products. Our product sold all over North America, Japan, Europe.

Our thinking: bring small but beautiful changes to life through repair.

Precision Screwdriver Set

Household & Electronics Repair

Mini screwdriver set

Make it easy to repair

【Powerful Functions】122 in 1 precision screwdriver set contains 98 screwdriver bits, 3TorxTR screwdriver bits and 21 auxiliary tools, such as screwdriver handle, flexible shaft, extension rod, magnetizer, magnetic pad, cleaning brush etc. Own this toolkit, you can replace the battery, screen and other parts of the smartphone, tablet, laptop, and upgrade the hard disk and performance of the computer and PC, disassemble and repair PS4, Xbox and other game consoles, repair drones, cameras, etc.
【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.
【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.
【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.
【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.


Premium Bits

These bits are precisely CNC machined, manufactured from high quality chrome vanadium steel that reduce rust, corrosion and abrasions giving you exact fit and long lasting service.

Precision Screwdriver Set

101 Screwdriver Bits and 21 Repair Tools

21 Repair Tools：Plastic Opening Tools, ESD Tweezers, SIM Card Ejector Pin, LCD Suction Cup, Triangle Opening Pry Tool, Plastic Spudgers, Magnetizing and Demagnetizing Tool and etc.

  • Computers and iMac
  • Laptops and Macbook
  • Tablet and iPads
  • iPhone and Android Phones
  • Game Consoles
  • Home Appliances
  • And More…

Read more

Warranty & Support

Price: $19.99 - $8.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:23 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Moongo Tool UNIVERSAL SOCKET is a must have tool for both the professional and the average person. It instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance. A great gift idea for dad, mom, father, mother, friends and family.

mens christmas gifts

You won’t know they needed a MoongoTool Universal Socket until they have one!

Built for Durability

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

One Size Fits Most

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

christmas gifts for men

Save Time And Money

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

The Perfect Gift for any Occasion!

The must have gift for the Father, Husband, Handyman, Guys, Boyfriend, Him, Do-It-Yourselfer, Boyfriend, Man or Woman.

This makes the perfect gift for the not-so-handy.

Suitable for DIY

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Trying to find a gift for someone that has every tool? Chances are they don’t have this!

UNIVERSAL SOCKET WRENCH can be adjusted to unscrew most metric, wing nuts, broken nuts, stripped nuts, eye bolts, square nuts, hexes, etc.unique design of the Hexagon and Spring Pins can be closely engaged with the parts, not easy to slip. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, automotive repair, and other household maintenance.
TOOS FOR MEN: Self-adjustable from standard 1/4in to 3/4in and metric 7mm to 19mm with over 130lbs of torque. Adapter turns your drill into a socket driver.
SPECIALLY MATERIAL: Durable chrome vanadium steel material, the hardness can reach 56HRC. We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly, Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!
GIFTS FOR MEN who have everything, a perfect gift for Father’s day/Mother’s day/Birthday/Valentines Day/Christmas/Anniversary /Halloween/Thanksgiving gifts etc. fathers day gifts for dad/grandpa/stepdad/hushand/brother from wife/daughter/son/girlfriend/kids. You won’t know you need universal socket until you have one! Make it yours now and make your life more easier.
UNCOMPROMISING CUSTOMER CARE: Any question, please feel free to contact us through Amazon,We will save your problem within 24 hours.We’d love to make you a perfect purchase experience!

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

Product Description

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

LZEODO POWER TOOL ORGANIZER

SPECIFICATIONS

Drill Organizer Rack*1

Wrench *1

Screws *12

Screws Nut *12

Screwdriver Holder *2

Expansion Nails Plug *3

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

From the brand

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Screwdrivers & tool bags

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

(1) 12V 1.5AH Lithium-Ion Battery;

(10) HSS6542 drill bits:1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 11/64, 3/16, 1/4;

(20) Screwdriver bits: Slotted 1/8”, 5/32”, 3/16”, 7/32”, 1/4”, 9/32”, POZI: PZ0, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3; Philips: PH0, PH1 X 2, PH2 X 5, PH3 X 2;

(10) Nut drivers: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 11/32, 3/8, 7/16, 15/32;

(1) 60mm magnetic extension bar;

(1) Battery Charger;

(1) Tool bag;

FASTPRO 12V Pink Drill Driver

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

Unique Stocking Stuffers For Men Universal Socket

We are a professional hardware manufacturer with over 30 years of experience who pursues to create a safe living space and bring safety and comfort for everyone in daily life.

The Universal Socket Set is suitable for everyone who needs it, whether you are a professional or an average person.

The Magical Grip Socket instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. This universal socket can be used in the automotive industry, home maintenance, manufacturing, construction and other industries.

One Size Fits Most Super Universal Socket

The universal socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp any shape nut,such as wing nut,hook nut,flange nut,hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

Upgraded Much Stronger Socket Tool

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

No need to hunt a socket. This covers most sizes and Works on stripped bolts and odd shapes ones too.

Satisfy Your Different Needs

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

This universal socket is perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance.
